long_description: The Patagonia Slopestyle Hoodie jacket for women supplies cozy, fleecy warmth and comfort, whether you're layering it under a shell jacket or lounging in the lodge. Soft, stretchy polyester fleece is treated with a Durable Water Repellent finish that repels light rain, snow or stains. High collar and adjustable hood provide all-weather defense without impairing your vision or limiting your mobility; hood is not helmet-compatible. Thumbholes let you secure the sleeves over hands and wrists for warmth. Zippered handwarmer pockets; two hidden zippered security pockets. Drawcord hem seals out the wind and snow and can be easily adjusted from within the handwarmer pockets, so your hands don't get chilled in the process. Women's Patagonia Slopestyle Hoodie has a full-length zipper.
short_description: The Patagonia Slopestyle Hoodie jacket for women supplies cozy, fleecy warmth and comfort, whether you're layering it under a shell jacket or lounging in the lodge.
